edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.tset

Class TSetContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.tset.TSetContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TSetContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the runtime context for a TSet. This holds the information related to indices, inputs etc. This will be passed on to TFunction in the runtime, so that corresponding TSet information is available for the functions.

    This is made Serializable because, it will be created with instances of BaseOp and it would need to be serialized and deserialized to create TaskInstances.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
